snippet: Federal workers say they feel like collateral damage in the continuing fiscal and ideological wars between the White House and its political rivals.
abstract: Federal workers say they feel like collateral damage in the continuing fiscal and ideological wars between the Obama administration and its political rivals; throngs of civil servants have been sent home without pay due to the government shutdown, and still others have been ordered to work without pay.
lead_paragraph: Federal workers say they feel like collateral damage in the continuing fiscal and ideological wars between the White House and its political rivals.

headline.main: As Government Slugs It Out, Government Workers Take It on the Chin
headline.print_headline: As Government Slugs It Out, Government Workers Take It on the Chin

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
